enterprise: We are processing the company registration for {{variable}}.

Once you receive the email, you can complete the company registration by accessing the website through the attached admin account.

pipeGenerator.title: Create Pipe Model
pipeGenerator.description: Create a pipe model to manage.

instructions.checkPower: 1. Make sure the RC car is powered on.
instructions.pressConnectButton: 2. Press the connect button to automatically connect the RC car.
instructions.connectionComplete: 3. A connection complete message will be displayed once the connection is successful.
instructions.avoidMovement: 4. Do not move the RC car during the connection process.

instructions.pageDescription: This page is for connecting the RC car to take pipe photos.
instructions.manualUploadInstruction: If you want to upload the pipe model without connecting the RC car, click the [Upload Pipe Model] button below.

instructions.startCapture: 1. Press the [Start Capture] button to begin taking pipe photos.
instructions.avoidInterference: 2. Avoid obstructing the RC car during photo capture.
instructions.autoSave: 3. The results will be saved automatically upon completion.
instructions.stopOnError: 4. The process will stop immediately if any issues occur.

instructions.modelingProcess: --In progress-- Description of the process using Blender to model based on captured photos --In progress--

instructions.uploadModel: Please upload the 3D model file of the pipe.
instructions.imageFileMessage: (Uploading an image file will initiate the model rendering process, which may take additional time.)
instructions.allowedFileTypes: Only GLTF or IMG files (.gltf, .png, .jpg, .jpeg) can be uploaded.

instructions.dataEntryPrompt: Enter the pipeline name, location, and floor information.

completed.previewAndSave: Check the preview below and press the save button to save.

failed.message: Model rendering failed. Please retry the pipe photo capture.
failed.inquiries: If the issue persists, please contact support.

instructions.checkModelList: Please check the created model in the model list.
